mapper.insert: insert into users(auth, nick_name, address, phone_number, sex, birthday, password, user_name, user_id) values(1, #{nick_name}, #{address}, #{phone_number}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{password}, #{user_name}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: select user_id, password, user_name, birthday, sex, phone_number, address, nick_name, auth from users where user_id=#{user_id} and password=SHA2(#{password}, 256)
SELECT * FROM users WHERE address = #{address} and phone_number = #{phone_number}
select user_id, user_name, birthday, sex, phone_number, address, nick_name, auth from users where auth!=0 order by user_id limit ${(pageNumber * 10)}, 10
